parameters.name: images
parameters.label: Input image directory
parameters.usage: Path to input images (must be surrounded with quotes)

parameters.name: markers
parameters.label: Input markers directory
parameters.usage: Path to marker (csv format) one per image (with same name)

parameters.name: overlap
parameters.label: Overlap
parameters.usage: percentage of overlap between splitted images

parameters.name: masksOverlap
parameters.label: Masks overlap
parameters.usage: Overlap (in pixel) for dask to perform computing of masks on chunks

parameters.name: mode
parameters.label: Normalization mode
parameters.usage: Configure how image will be normalize before merge for segmentation

parameters.name: profile
parameters.label: Configuration profile(s)
parameters.usage: Configuration profile to use. Can use multiple (comma separated).

parameters.name: outDir
parameters.label: Output directory
parameters.usage: The output directory where the results will be saved

parameters.name: name
parameters.label: Name for the pipeline run
parameters.usage: Name for the pipeline run. If not specified, Nextflow will automatically generate a random mnemonic
